00042     void MultipleAlignment::GotohalignMultiple(
00043         const VectorSequenceContainer* input, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00044       {
00045         set_origSize(input->getNumberOfSequences());
00046 
00047         for (uint u=0; u<input->getNumberOfSequences(); u++)
00048           {
00049 
00050             for (uint k=u+1; k<input->getNumberOfSequences(); k++)
00051               {
00052 
00053                 Alignment* temp = GotohAlignment(input->getSequence(u),
00054                     input->getSequence(k), scoreM);
00055                 std:cerr << prettyPrint->AlignmentPrettyPrint(temp);
00056 
00057                 bpp::SequenceContainerTools::append(*this, *temp);
00058               }
00059 
00060           }
00061 
00062       }
00063     void MultipleAlignment::NMWalignMultiple(
00064         const VectorSequenceContainer* input, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00065       {
00066 
00067         std::cout << input->getNumberOfSequences()
00068             *input->getNumberOfSequences() << " to go" << std::endl;
00069 
00070           {
00071 
00072             for (uint u=1; u<input->getNumberOfSequences(); u++)
00073               {
00074                 for (uint k=u+1; k<input->getNumberOfSequences(); k++)
00075                   {
00076 
00077                     Alignment* temp = NeedlemanWunschAlignment(
00078                         input->getSequence(u), input->getSequence(k), scoreM);
00079                     
00080                     prettyPrint->AlignmentPrettyPrint(temp);
00081 
00082                     bpp::SequenceContainerTools::append(*this, *temp);
00083                     std::cout
00084                         << "******************************** Done with Nr. "
00085                         << u << "," << k << std::endl;
00086                   }
00087 
00088               }
00089           }
00090       }
00091 
00092     MultipleAlignment* MultipleAlignment::TopologicSortedAlignment(
00093         BoolMatrix G, const Alignment* pairWiseAlignments)
00094       {
00095 
00096         MultipleAlignment* out = new MultipleAlignment(pairWiseAlignments->getAlphabet());
00097 
00098         //Search connected Compounds.. those are represented by 1 in the same Column of the Matrix and not divided by 0
00099 
00100           {
00101             for (uint i=0; i<G.size(); i++)
00102               {
00103 
00104                 for (uint j=0; j< G[i].size(); j++)
00105                   {
00106                     //Check for match or not mismatch := !gap
00107                     if (pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->getValue(j) != -1)
00108                       G[i/2][j] = true;
00109                     else
00110                       G[i/2][j] = false;
00111                   }
00112               }
00113           }
00114         return out;
00115       }
00116   }
